summary.value: Once a grand temple over clear waters, now a ruin squatting in sewage. Can you restore it?

data.haunt:
If the Haunteeâ€™s Bond with you has more positive emotions, they may change any damage they deal to ice, or add 2 damage for each positive emotion if it was already ice.

If their bond with you has more negative emotions, they may instead change the damage to poison, or add 2 damage for each negative emotion if it was already poison.
data.ritual: Guide and purify water to bring life.
